name: Ghost Town Photo Hunt
description:
A paranormal photography game made for the Totally Terrifying Trans Game Jam 2022

Explore the area to find ghosts and take some picture back to the town folks. You can also try to collect all the transgender flags hidden around !

The game was made by KrankerApfel, AliceRandom,  NineAlex and Kahnetop.

Controls: ActionsGamepadMouse/Keyboardmove character

YI / EnterSwitch TPS/FPS mode
L1Mouse middle click
FPS mode camera toy ( Mouse/Keyboard only) :

When you are in FPS mode, you can change some camera settings by pressing one of the keys below and use the mouse scroll wheel to increment/decrement them. 

  • T : temperature 
  • Y : tint 
  • F : focus length 
  • E : exposure
  • V : vignette 
  • G : grain 
  • P : reset all settings
